function.name: xmlvalidate
function.help: Uses a Document Type Definition (DTD) or XML Schema to validate an XML text document or an XML document object.

parameter.name: xmlDoc
parameter.help: Any of the following: - A string containing an XML document. - The name of an XML file. - The URL of an XML file; valid protocol identifiers include http, https, ftp, and file. - An XML document object, such as one generated by the XmlParse function.

parameter.name: validator
parameter.help: Any of the following: - A string containing a DTD or Schema. - The name of a DTD or Schema file. - The URL of a DTD or Schema file; valid protocol identifiers include http, https, ftp, and file.
